Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Unscripted
programme.desc: Musical duo Marilyn McCoo and Billy Davis discuss their partnership in music and marriage.

programme.title: Heritage Falls
programme.desc: Basketball coach Charlie Fitzpatrick has had a rocky relationship with his son, Evan, but now he has a great idea on how to heal the past. He takes his son, and grandson, Markie, to a rustic cabin where he hopes they will all bond by hiking and running an obstacle course. It's Evan's worst nightmare. Over three hilarious, adventurous, soul-searching days the men discover what it means to be a father, a son, a grandfather.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E8 Gator Raid With new cattle operations in both south Florida and northern Alabama, the cowboys must divide and conquer in order to handle all of the work. In Florida, cattle are missing tails and calves are disappearing mysteriously, so Booger and Bubba head south to track down a predator. That leaves Cody to singlehandedly oversee an important cattle shipment at the ranch up north. Back at home, the guys convince Bubba to wear an empathy belly in hopes of teaching him to empathize with Kaley’s pregnancy pain. The whole gang pitches in to help Matthew ace his school science project.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E9 Specialty Sales and Recipe Fails As the cowboys continue to expand their operation, they round up some of their cattle in north Alabama and ship them down to greener pastures in south Florida. Cody and Misty are looking for extra income but they are unsure if they have enough time in their busy schedule to stage another specialty cattle sale. Bubba’s hard work pays off when he finds a buyer for the ranch horses he’s been training. Booger and Jaclyn struggle to recreate Grandma’s recipes for a cowboy cookbook, so they call the families together for a taste test and some honest feedback.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E1 Day of the Hunter A famous old frontiersman, with a reputation as the best rifleman around, challenges Luke to see who's really the best with a rifle.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E2 Mail Order Groom A mail-order husband arrives in North Fork, and finds not only a bride, but also harassment from two local troublemakers.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S3 E8 Buffalo Wild It’s every cowboy for himself and the last chance for immunity. Cowboys must pen cows, then sort and load six rogue buffalo onto a trailer.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E7 Doc Susie Goes Underground After the suspicious death of a tunnel worker, and unconvincing answers from the project's lead engineer, Doc Susie goes on a covert mission to find out what happened. Deep underground, she finds her own life in peril when she's trapped by a cave-in.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E10 Jim Roberts Cleans Up Jerome In his first week on the job as the new constable of Jerome, Arizona, Jim Roberts gets to work arresting the town's troublemakers and teaching his timid deputy how to be a courageous lawman as they track down a stone-cold killer and his gang.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E4 Mason & Dixon: Trailblazing Surveyors English astronomers Charles Mason and Jeremiah Dixon brave deadly terrain and hostile Native Americans to resolve a border dispute in Colonial America. With science and courage, they survey their famous Mason-Dixon Line with pinpoint accuracy.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E8 Robert Rogers: Frontier Soldier Robert Rogers leads an elite fighting force of fearless rangers behind enemy lines to fight French forces in Colonial America, but one mission tests his men as never before when they must trek 200 miles through the wilderness without food.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E12 The Keepsake A young woman named Amanda comes to Sweetwater, claiming to be Teaspoon's daughter. But she and her companion's true intentions are to steal a keepsake worth a small fortune that once belonged to Teaspoon's dead daughter.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Schoolmaster Mr. Griswald is the new North Fork schoolmaster. As a harsh disciplinarian, he quickly clashes with Mark and his friend one too many times. When the boys decide to play hooky from school, they find big trouble when they get trapped in an old mine.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E11 The Promoter Con man Jack Scully comes to North Fork with his friend, Reuben Miles, a simple-minded young man who is fast with a gun. Scully uses the young gun to win money by coaxing people into gunfights. Lucas becomes the next target.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E12 The Battle of Stone Corral When bandits rob a train and gun down a pursuing marshal, they spark one of the largest manhunts in California history. After taking shelter behind the crumbling walls of Stone Corral, they make their final stand against a hail of gunfire.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E12 The Illustrator Hannah Shaw waits excitedly for New York artist Jeremiah Crowley to come to North Fork to paint her portrait. When he finally arrives, Hannah discovers he is a drunkard and is in trouble with the law. Lucas, as acting marshal, tries to help him out.

programme.title: Heritage Falls
programme.desc: Basketball coach Charlie Fitzpatrick has had a rocky relationship with his son, Evan, but now he has a great idea on how to heal the past. He takes his son, and grandson, Markie, to a rustic cabin where he hopes they will all bond by hiking and running an obstacle course. It's Evan's worst nightmare. Over three hilarious, adventurous, soul-searching days the men discover what it means to be a father, a son, a grandfather.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran battles prejudice and greed as he helps a woman save her ranch from a land grab, while searching for a cure for his mute son.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E15 A Case of Identity Aaron Wingate lost his wife and son in a river boat fire years ago. The boy was never found. Wingate hires two private detectives who come to North Fork and decide that Mark will fit the bill. Lucas must fight for custody.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E16 The Visitor A pretty young widow named Ann Dodd passes through North Fork on her way to claim her inheritance. She and Lucas are immediately attracted to each other, but danger awaits as other heirs try to take Ann's life to get the inheritance for themselves.

programme.title: The Old West Trading Post
programme.desc: S1 E1 Strong Box, Winchester, Spurs, Gloves, and Colt In rugged Whitefish, Montana, the Old West is alive and kicking at Cowboy Ron's remarkable store. Along with his wife, Eila, he buys, sells, and trades authentic Western memorabilia and honors the rugged individuals who tamed America's wild frontier.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E2 Home Ranch After Lucas buys his ranch, hired hands of a wealthy cattleman demand he leave. When Lucas refuses, the men beat him, drag him, and then they burn his ranch house to the ground. Lucas tracks these men down and confronts their boss, Oat Jackford.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E9 Last Shot at the OK Corral In an odd twist of fate, photographers C.S. and Mollie Fly decide to open a studio next to a dusty corral in Tombstone, Arizona, and they end up taking the last shot of the Old West's most infamous gunbattle, the Shootout at the O.K. Corral.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Bone War It's not gold that inspires a rush of treasure hunters to flood the windblown bluffs of Wyoming: it's bones. After stumbling upon a strange fossil, a man is caught in the crossfire of rival paleontologists warring over a trove of dinosaur bones.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E2 William Bartram: America's First Great Naturalist Naturalist William Bartram explores the unmapped regions of the South to document the native fauna and flora. After surviving many encounters with Native Americans and wildlife, it's an invisible virus that may finally end the journey and his life.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E3 Daniel Boone: Cunning Woodsman Legendary frontiersman Daniel Boone faces the biggest challenge of his life when the Shawnee take him prisoner. He must find a way to escape and travel 160 miles through hostile territory to warn Boonesborough, and his family, of a looming attack.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E13 Fall from Grace After Jimmy has an argument with Teaspoon, he quits the Pony Express and begins working for hired gunmen led by Grace, the owner of the local saloon. However, he learns that the outlaws are planning to rob the Army of guns and ammunition.

programme.title: The Last Days of Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: When the famous James brothers give up robbing banks and attempt to live as reputable gentleman farmers, they are soon forced to seek revenge on the men who bomb their mother's house, crippling her, and killing their stepbrother.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran battles prejudice and greed as he helps a woman save her ranch from a land grab, while searching for a cure for his mute son.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E15 A Case of Identity Aaron Wingate lost his wife and son in a river boat fire years ago. The boy was never found. Wingate hires two private detectives who come to North Fork and decide that Mark will fit the bill. Lucas must fight for custody.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E16 The Visitor A pretty young widow named Ann Dodd passes through North Fork on her way to claim her inheritance. She and Lucas are immediately attracted to each other, but danger awaits as other heirs try to take Ann's life to get the inheritance for themselves.

programme.title: The Old West Trading Post
programme.desc: S1 E1 Strong Box, Winchester, Spurs, Gloves, and Colt In rugged Whitefish, Montana, the Old West is alive and kicking at Cowboy Ron's remarkable store. Along with his wife, Eila, he buys, sells, and trades authentic Western memorabilia and honors the rugged individuals who tamed America's wild frontier.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E2 Home Ranch After Lucas buys his ranch, hired hands of a wealthy cattleman demand he leave. When Lucas refuses, the men beat him, drag him, and then they burn his ranch house to the ground. Lucas tracks these men down and confronts their boss, Oat Jackford.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E9 Last Shot at the OK Corral In an odd twist of fate, photographers C.S. and Mollie Fly decide to open a studio next to a dusty corral in Tombstone, Arizona, and they end up taking the last shot of the Old West's most infamous gunbattle, the Shootout at the O.K. Corral.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles

programme.desc: S1 E13 Fall from Grace After Jimmy has an argument with Teaspoon, he quits the Pony Express and begins working for hired gunmen led by Grace, the owner of the local saloon. However, he learns that the outlaws are planning to rob the Army of guns and ammunition.

programme.title: The Last Days of Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: When the famous James brothers give up robbing banks and attempt to live as reputable gentleman farmers, they are soon forced to seek revenge on the men who bomb their mother's house, crippling her, and killing their stepbrother.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: Christmas in Wolf Creek
programme.desc: It's Samantha and Austin to the rescue as they track a wayward reindeer in time to save the town's Christmas Eve play, but will this adventure bring them closer together, or create more tension than their new relationship can weather?

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E31 The Angry Man A neighboring rancher's son is seriously injured in an accident. With the young man's condition getting worse, Lucas learns the rancher won't take his son to the doctor since he feels his wife died from poor treatment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E32 The Woman The residents force Miss Adams, the North Fork schoolteacher, to leave her job because they feel she is too progressive for supporting women's right to vote. Lucas gets involved and he learns that lies have been circulated by a past student.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E33 The Money Gun Lucas has a disdain for Oat Jackford since years ago he burned down his ranch to get him off property he wanted. When hired killer Tom King arrives in North Fork and is on Oat's trail, Lucas decides to side with and help the man he once hated.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E34 A Matter of Faith A trail bum rides into North Fork during one of the worst droughts in years. He claims that he can bring rain to their town. Many believe that he's a water witcher, but a railroad boss resents his intrusion and wants him gone.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E3 Jim Baker: A Born Leader Heading west as a young adventurer, greenhorn Jim Baker quickly develops a reputation as a skilled marksman and mountain man. When a party of trappers is surrounded and attacked by Cheyenne and Arapaho warriors, Baker proves that he is also a leader.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E2 Billy the Kid: Birth of an Outlaw Teenaged fugitive William Bonney is given a second chance when a kindhearted ranch owner offers him a job. But when his new employer is killed in cold blood, Bonney reverts to his criminal ways, seeking vengeance and transforming into Billy the Kid.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Discoveries of George McJunkin After a devastating storm, ranch foreman George McJunkin finds ancient bison fossils and flint points unearthed in a riverbank, and he sets out to find someone in the scientific community who will acknowledge the importance of his discovery.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E3 Home of the Brave After an Indian attack on settlers, Buck finds himself in the middle, torn between his loyalty to his Kiowa brother and his bond with Pony Express members. After the tribe captures Ike, Buck must prove that he is a real Indian at heart.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Brother-In-Law Mark's uncle, Johnny Gibb, a famous rodeo rider, comes to visit. Mark idolizes his uncle, but Lucas soon discovers that Johnny is on the run from the law after robbing an express office, and is afraid that Johnny is a bad influence on young Mark.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E6 Eight Hours to Die Corrupt Judge Burton seeks justice against those who are responsible for the hanging of his son, including Lucas McCain, who caught him. When Burton discovers that Lucas has a son, he captures Lucas to make him watch Mark suffer the same punishment.

programme.title: Christmas in the Pines
programme.desc: Ariel thought she bought the perfect cottage for Christmas, but, through a mix-up, two offers were accepted on the house. As she battles Mark, the other buyer, Ariel realizes she may not only have found the perfect house, but also the perfect love.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: Christmas in Wolf Creek
programme.desc: It's Samantha and Austin to the rescue as they track a wayward reindeer in time to save the town's Christmas Eve play, but will this adventure bring them closer together, or create more tension than their new relationship can weather?

programme.desc: S1 E6 Eight Hours to Die Corrupt Judge Burton seeks justice against those who are responsible for the hanging of his son, including Lucas McCain, who caught him. When Burton discovers that Lucas has a son, he captures Lucas to make him watch Mark suffer the same punishment.

programme.title: Christmas in the Pines
programme.desc: Ariel thought she bought the perfect cottage for Christmas, but, through a mix-up, two offers were accepted on the house. As she battles Mark, the other buyer, Ariel realizes she may not only have found the perfect house, but also the perfect love.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: The Warrant: Breaker's Law
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal John Breaker and his deputy ride to a town held hostage by a ruthless gang as they transport a prisoner through the West. With the fate of a community at stake, they must decide if they will abandon the town or make a stand for justice.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E14 Hard Time The Kid tries to help a woman in the corrupt small town of Prosperity but, while there, he finds himself in trouble with the law. When the sheriff sentences The Kid to hard labor, the riders suspect something is not quite right, and come to his aid.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E15 Charles M. Russell: The Cowboy Artist Charlie Russell is an aimless cowhand who loves the freedom of the cowboy way of life, and he is a self-taught artist who enjoys capturing the scenes of his rugged work on the range. Too embarrassed to ask people to pay for his paintings, he gives most of them away to friends or trades them for drinks at the saloon. But that changes quickly after he falls in love. Charlie’s new bride Nancy gives him the encouragement he needs to stop cowboying in order to focus on his artwork. Under her watchful eye, he sobers up, stops cowboying, and improves his mastery of painting. Nancy is so proud of Charlie’s talent that she doesn’t hesitate to ask top dollar for his paintings. Years later, when legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson tries to do a piece on Charlie, he quickly realizes that he must first deal with the woman behind the famous cowboy artist Charles M. Russell.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E4 The Legend of Nat Love When Black cowboy Nat Love overnights in Deadwood during a cattle drive, he decides to enter a Fourth of July cowboy competition. Confident in his roping, riding, and shooting skills, he is eager to test his mettle against the best cowboys around.

programme.title: Cowboss Oklahoma
programme.desc: S1 E1 Risky Business With the help of his mother and trusted ranch hands, Cowboss Ethan Treadwell oversees his family's 60,000-acre cattle operation on the plains of Oklahoma. It's not an easy way to earn a living, but, for Ethan, it's a labor of love.

programme.title: Christmas on the Range
programme.desc: Despite constant threats from her ambitious neighbor, Kendall Riley fights heroically to save the family ranch. In a surprising turn of events, Clint McCree, a veterinarian and her neighbor's son, arrives on the scene to deliver a calf from a cow having trouble giving birth. Gradually, a romance blossoms, until her neighbor's henchmen scatter Kendall's herd and she wonders if Clint's concern is genuine or if he is part of his family's effort to sabotage her land. Filled with action, adventure, and emotion, this modern-day Western provides an engaging tribute to small towns, big dreams and the power of love. Stars Erin Cahill (Saving Grace, Red Widow, Sleepy Hollow), Nicholas Gonzalez (The Good Doctor, Walker Texas Ranger), A Martinez (Longmire, The Cowboys, Days of our Lives), and Lindsay Wagner (The Bionic Woman, Grey's Anatomy).

programme.title: Once Upon a Texas Train
programme.desc: An outlaw and a Texas Ranger have a life-long personal feud, but now, as grumpy older men, they must put their differences aside and face a common problem - a young gang of outlaws ravaging Texas.

programme.title: Christmas in Wolf Creek
programme.desc: It's Samantha and Austin to the rescue as they track a wayward reindeer in time to save the town's Christmas Eve play, but will this adventure bring them closer together, or create more tension than their new relationship can weather?

programme.desc: An outlaw and a Texas Ranger have a life-long personal feud, but now, as grumpy older men, they must put their differences aside and face a common problem - a young gang of outlaws ravaging Texas.

programme.title: Christmas in Wolf Creek
programme.desc: It's Samantha and Austin to the rescue as they track a wayward reindeer in time to save the town's Christmas Eve play, but will this adventure bring them closer together, or create more tension than their new relationship can weather?

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E10 Generations to Come Booger and Bubba struggle to keep up with ranch work while Cody is busy with his specialty cattle sale. Much to Bubba’s chagrin, Booger hires their ornery old hand Billy to pick up the slack. Cody manages to pack the sale barn with potential buyers, but will they open their wallets for the high-end cattle? Bubba and Kaley turn their dining room into a playroom for their expanding family. Booger begins collecting old stories and memories from Grandma to accompany the recipes in her cowboy cookbook.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E11 Let It Ripp The cowboys are busy processing cattle and preparing for an important shipment when a chute gets stuck, bringing work to a halt and risking time and money they can’t afford to lose. Booger trains a cutting horse and enters it into its first competition. Cody organizes a campout for the youth at the Alabama Sheriff’s Boys Ranch, and the guys share some of their cowboy wisdom with the hope of inspiring another generation to follow the cowboy way. Friends and family gather for a baby shower, where Bubba and Kaley reveal the name they’ve chosen for their new addition.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E17 Hero While hunting, Colly Vane encounters a dangerous outlaw, The Domino Kid, who forces Vane to shoot him. When he brings the body back to town, it's discovered he was shot in the back. Instead of being a hero, Vane faces danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E18 The Horse Traders Kansas Sawyer is Lucas' friend who was cheated in a horse-trading deal. Lucas investigates Colonel Bourbon's operation and discovers his illegal process. He also learns that the horse Sawyer bought was stolen and is being sought after by outlaws.

programme.title: Christmas in the Rockies
programme.desc: After her father is hurt in a timber accident, Katie Jolly must enter a lumberjack competition to save her family's business. But when the paramedic who saved her dad's life also joins the contest, a romance sparks just in time for Christmas.

programme.title: Freedom on the Range
programme.desc: S1 E1 From brave lawmen to rugged cowboys, discover the untold stories of African Americans' cultural significance in the Old West.

programme.title: Christmas in the Pines
programme.desc: Ariel thought she bought the perfect cottage for Christmas, but, through a mix-up, two offers were accepted on the house. As she battles Mark, the other buyer, Ariel realizes she may not only have found the perfect house, but also the perfect love.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E13 The Silent Knife Mark, a young mute boy, arrives in North Fork. When townspeople treat Mark badly because he cannot speak, Lucas and his son, Mark, befriend him. Desperate for cash, the boy steals $500 from a stagecoach line. Lucas convinces him to return the money.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E14 Miss Bertie Bertie Hoakam, a lively little old lady, comes to North Fork. She tells Lucas and Micah of her plan to capture a ruthless bandit for the reward money to support herself. To everyone's surprise, she succeeds with her plan.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E15 Six Years and a Day Mrs. Marston is in dire need of a doctor after problems arise as she is giving birth. Mark and Lucas try to help but they need Doc Burrage, who is out of town. More problems come when two men arrive at the McCain Ranch intent on killing the doctor.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E16 Flowers by the Door Lucas is helping Cora Seevers mend a broken fence when Micah rides up to tell them about a murder nearby. The only clue at the scene is a pack of flower seeds. Lucas discovers that a sly book salesman offering free seeds to his victims is to blame.

programme.title: County Line: All In
programme.desc: The murder of a crooked lawyer on the county line forces two neighboring sheriffs to put aside their differences to take down the killer.

programme.title: County Line: All In
programme.desc: The murder of a crooked lawyer on the county line forces two neighboring sheriffs to put aside their differences to take down the killer.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E12 Final Cow Down, The During a long drought in lower Alabama, the cowboys have been chasing green grass throughout the surrounding area. Through new partnerships with other ranchers, they’ve finally ended up with a bumper crop of calves in north Alabama and a healthy herd in south Florida. Cody and Misty seek out the perfect high-value bull to build their growing cattle business, and they watch as their dream home finally takes shape. Bubba and Kaley welcome baby Ripp Walker Thompson into the world. Booger and Jaclyn surprise Grandma with a cowboy cookbook filled with her recipes and stories from life on the range.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E19 The Spoiler An elderly couple move to North Fork and settle down under a false name to keep the town from knowing they are parents of a vicious killer on the loose. However, their plan fails when their son shows up and causes chaos.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E20 Heller A teenage girl named Heller and her brother are abused by her drunken stepfather. The town becomes aware after Heller is caught stealing from the general store. The children plan the drunk's demise as the cruelty continues. Lucas steps in to help.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S3 E9 Heart of a Champion In a horsemanship test, the cowboys show off their four-legged partners’ best moves, then work cows on wild horses—if they can catch them!

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E8 The Gold Rush Lawman When failed prospector John Hicks Adams is elected sheriff of Santa Clara County, he must prove that he won't be a bust as a lawman too. Just weeks into the job, his courage is tested when a band of stagecoach robbers begins terrorizing the area.

programme.title: It Is Written
programme.desc: "It Is Written" has been a staple on American television since premiering in 1956. The weekly program, currently hosted by John Bradshaw, applies timeless truths to everyday life, with many episodes dealing with issues such as loneliness, fear, low self-esteem and spiritual principles. With its straightforward, uplifting presentations, the program aims to inspire and encourage people of all faiths and creeds. Founded by George Vandeman, "It Is Written" was the first religious telecast to air in color.

The two men, with their families, move to the recently settled Texas wilds to start over, away from the plantations of the South. But the local Indian tribes don't want them there, and start kidnapping settler women and children. Since the Indians won't talk to white men, Britt is sent to try and negotiate with them.

But hazards along the trail, and Tadlock's increasing megalomania, threaten to break up the expedition. programme.title: The Virginian

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles

programme.title: The Virginian
programme.desc: A magazine writer's (Barbara Eden) imaginings put bounty hunters on the trail of the Virginian; guest Skip Homeier.

programme.title: The Virginian
programme.desc: A millionaire (Linden Chiles) dumped off a train joins the Virginian's cattle drive, but rebels against orders to earn his keep as a cook's helper and plots revenge against the Virginian; guest Slim Pickens.

programme.title: Cheyenne

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: Wagon Train

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, a young boy wanders off to find Santa Claus.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Two jealous cowboys fight over a new saloon hostess the night before her wedding.

programme.title: Laramie
programme.desc: Jess and Mort search for the men who robbed the Laramie bank and shot Mike; after finding two, they learn the third man may be in Chlorine, so Jess heads out alone.

programme.title: Tales of Wells Fargo
programme.desc: While pursuing a bandit, Jim runs into his friend and fellow agent Ben Wilson, who awaits his fiancée, Ellen Stevens, but when Ellen's stagecoach arrives, Jim learns the bandit tried to rob it and realizes Ellen holds the key to finding him.

programme.title: Tales of Wells Fargo
programme.desc: An outlaw poses as an Army major in a meeting with Hardie.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: An outlaw tries to live honestly, but still faces danger when Matt come to his town with a warrant.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: The shooting of several members of an outlaw gang triggers an emotional crisis in Matt when he is haunted by memories of all the men he has killed.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A naive girl from the East becomes the victim of brutal violence in Dodge City.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A flirtatious girl pushes her admirers to fight for her affections.

programme.title: Gunsmoke: The Long Ride
programme.desc: At the wedding of his daughter (Amy Stock-Poynton), retired marshal Matt Dillon (James Arness) is shockingly charged with a murder he did not commit. Instead of a honeymoon, the newlyweds must instead flee with Dillon and try to help him clear his name by finding the real murderer. As a bounty-hunting posse pursues hot on their heels, the trio receives help from two unlikely sources: prostitute Uncle Jane Merkel (Ali MacGraw) and preacher John Parsley (James Brolin).

programme.title: Black Fox
programme.desc: Ever since Alan Johnson (Christopher Reeve) freed Britt "Black Fox" Johnson (Tony Todd) from slavery, the two have considered each other not just friends but blood brothers. The two men, with their families, move to the recently settled Texas wilds to start over, away from the plantations of the South. But the local Indian tribes don't want them there, and start kidnapping settler women and children. Since the Indians won't talk to white men, Britt is sent to try and negotiate with them.

programme.title: Tales of Wells Fargo
programme.desc: Jim goes undercover as a trainee for Wells Fargo, to try and find out who is supplying renegade Indians with the guns they are using on their murderous raids.

programme.title: Tales of Wells Fargo
programme.desc: Hardie isn't pleased when a man and beautiful woman insist on becoming passengers on the stagecoach he will use.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: Tired of his boring life, attorney Al Jennings chooses a life of danger when he takes part in notorious outlaw Dick West's last crime spree.

programme.title: Tales of Wells Fargo
programme.desc: Hardie organizes the defense of a stage-relay station against an attack.

programme.title: Laramie
programme.desc: Wyoming Territory has become the winter battleground for the warring Sioux and Cheyenne, forcing Slim and Jess to close the ranch and relay station.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: The High Chaparral

programme.title: The Big Valley

programme.title: The Big Valley
programme.desc: Jarrod tries to reform an outlaw's girlfriend (Lynn Loring) by having her spend Christmas with the Barkleys.

programme.title: The Last Wagon
programme.desc: Comanche Todd (Richard Widmark), a white man living with an Indian tribe, is captured by Sheriff Bull Harper (George Mathews) following the murder of the sheriff's three brothers. Heading back to town, the wagon train in which the vicious sheriff and his abused prisoner are traveling is attacked by a vengeful Apache tribe whose women and children have been killed by a band of white men. After the slaughter, Todd must bring the survivors, including the beautiful Jenny (Felicia Farr), to safety.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: Young men of the Pony Express brave harsh conditions. With Josh Brolin, Anthony Zerbe, Stephen Baldwin.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: Hickok's kindness brings good fortune to the riders when a grateful old prospector named Cyrus deeds half of his gold mine to them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A Southern belle arrives in North Fork claiming that Micah is her husband.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas regrets his attitude toward a reformed outlaw.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A woman arrives in Dodge City to search for the body of her husband, who was reportedly killed by Indians.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: An old man and his grandson take on a ruthless gang of rustlers who attempt to steal their prize breeding bull.

programme.title: The Last Sunset
programme.desc: Fugitive Brendan O'Malley (Kirk Douglas) crosses the Mexican border and heads to the farm of his ex-lover, Belle (Dorothy Malone), where her husband hires him to help with a cattle drive. U.S. Marshall Dana Stribling (Rock Hudson) arrives and, out of his jurisdiction, joins the drive to keep tabs on O'Malley. En route to Texas, Belle falls for Stribling, while O'Malley takes an interest in Belle's daughter, Missy (Carol Lynley), unaware that a dark secret could soon unravel everything.

programme.title: Gunsmoke: The Long Ride
programme.desc: At the wedding of his daughter (Amy Stock-Poynton), retired marshal Matt Dillon (James Arness) is shockingly charged with a murder he did not commit. Instead of a honeymoon, the newlyweds must instead flee with Dillon and try to help him clear his name by finding the real murderer. As a bounty-hunting posse pursues hot on their heels, the trio receives help from two unlikely sources: prostitute Uncle Jane Merkel (Ali MacGraw) and preacher John Parsley (James Brolin).

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas has in-law trouble when his late wife's brother arrives in town.

programme.title: The High Chaparral
programme.desc: A miner closed down by Apache raids ignores John's objections and hires a bounty hunter.

programme.title: The High Chaparral
programme.desc: John protects a priest (Ramon Novarro) traveling with two nuns and a girl whose demented fiance wants her back.

programme.title: Mike Murdock - School of Wisdom
programme.desc: Biblical principles of wisdom that help individuals face life's successes.

programme.title: David Jeremiah
programme.desc: In this weekly program, Dr. David Jeremiah delivers practical messages to the congregation at the Shadow Mountain Community Church in San Diego. Also featured is music from the Shadow Mountain Community Church Choir and Orchestra, as well as performances by musical guests that have included Steve Green and Charles Billingsley. Men and women who have been impacted by the Turning Point ministry also share their stories with viewers. During the month of December, "Turning Point" usually features special Christmas programming.

programme.title: In Touch With Dr. Charles Stanley
programme.desc: Dr. Charles Stanley, pastor of the First Baptist Church in Atlanta, shares his insights on Christian faith and enlightens viewers with spiritual motivation.

programme.title: Michael Youssef
programme.desc: Passionately proclaiming God's word to people around the world through the ministries of Leading The Way.

programme.title: The Virginian
programme.desc: The Virginian asks a dance-hall singer (Tammy Grimes) to trick a shady character (Ed Nelson) into revealing information that could clear Garth of a trumped-up murder charge.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband; as Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: Daniel Boone
programme.desc: Josh returns to his hometown to visit a friend but finds the community a wreck and his friend missing.

programme.title: Daniel Boone
programme.desc: On a cold Christmas Eve, hungry Boonesborough awaits the birth of an Indian child who could reconcile two tribes.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A shady manager (Jack Oakie) involves his singer nephew (Wayne Newton) in a Christmas fund-raising drive.

programme.title: The Way West
programme.desc: In search of greener pastures, Senator William J. Tadlock (Kirk Douglas) heads west, with scores of settlers following behind. Tadlock has hired an experienced scout, Dick Summers (Robert Mitchum), to accompany the caravan on the way from Missouri to Oregon. But hazards along the trail, and Tadlock's increasing megalomania, threaten to break up the expedition. Their problems get bigger when one of the pilgrims accidentally kills the son of a Sioux chief.

programme.title: Gunsmoke: Return to Dodge
programme.desc: Upon his release from jail, bad guy Will Mannon (Steve Forrest) is determined to take revenge on retired marshal Matt Dillon (James Arness) and Miss Kitty (Amanda Blake), who he blames for putting him away. At the same time, Dillon's pal Jake (Earl Holliman) tries to warn his friend but instead is falsely accused of murdering the prison warden. While Dillon sets out to track down Jake, Mannon terrorizes Kitty in Dodge. Eventually, Dillon makes his way back and confronts his vengeful nemesis.

programme.title: Tales of Wells Fargo
programme.desc: Hardie spends Christmas hunting for gunrunners moving weapons across the Mexican border.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt runs into trouble when he spurns the romantic advances of an outlaw's girlfriend.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt is suspicious of a gambler's intentions when the man courts a robber's widow who may be able to lead him to loot.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Chester's a little embarrassed by his brother's primitive ways and tries to make him look silly, but Magnus teaches everyone a lesson.

programme.title: McLintock!
programme.desc: Aging rancher George Washington McLintock (John Wayne), a wealthy self-made man, is forced to deal with numerous personal and professional problems. Seemingly everyone wants a piece of his enormous farmstead, including high-ranking government men, McLintock's own sons and nearby Native Americans. As McLintock tries to juggle his various adversaries, his wife, who left him two years previously, suddenly returns. But she isn't interested in her husband -- she wants custody of their daughter.

programme.title: Gunsmoke

programme.title: Heritage Falls
programme.desc: Basketball coach Charlie Fitzpatrick has had a rocky relationship with his son, Evan, but now he has a great idea on how to heal the past. He takes his son, and grandson, Markie, to a rustic cabin where he hopes they will all bond by hiking and running an obstacle course. It's Evan's worst nightmare. Over three hilarious, adventurous, soul-searching days the men discover what it means to be a father, a son, a grandfather.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E8 Gator Raid With new cattle operations in both south Florida and northern Alabama, the cowboys must divide and conquer in order to handle all of the work. In Florida, cattle are missing tails and calves are disappearing mysteriously, so Booger and Bubba head south to track down a predator. That leaves Cody to singlehandedly oversee an important cattle shipment at the ranch up north. Back at home, the guys convince Bubba to wear an empathy belly in hopes of teaching him to empathize with Kaley’s pregnancy pain. The whole gang pitches in to help Matthew ace his school science project.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E9 Specialty Sales and Recipe Fails As the cowboys continue to expand their operation, they round up some of their cattle in north Alabama and ship them down to greener pastures in south Florida. Cody and Misty are looking for extra income but they are unsure if they have enough time in their busy schedule to stage another specialty cattle sale. Bubba’s hard work pays off when he finds a buyer for the ranch horses he’s been training. Booger and Jaclyn struggle to recreate Grandma’s recipes for a cowboy cookbook, so they call the families together for a taste test and some honest feedback.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E1 Day of the Hunter A famous old frontiersman, with a reputation as the best rifleman around, challenges Luke to see who's really the best with a rifle.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E2 Mail Order Groom A mail-order husband arrives in North Fork, and finds not only a bride, but also harassment from two local troublemakers.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S3 E8 Buffalo Wild It’s every cowboy for himself and the last chance for immunity. Cowboys must pen cows, then sort and load six rogue buffalo onto a trailer.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E7 Doc Susie Goes Underground After the suspicious death of a tunnel worker, and unconvincing answers from the project's lead engineer, Doc Susie goes on a covert mission to find out what happened. Deep underground, she finds her own life in peril when she's trapped by a cave-in.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E10 Jim Roberts Cleans Up Jerome In his first week on the job as the new constable of Jerome, Arizona, Jim Roberts gets to work arresting the town's troublemakers and teaching his timid deputy how to be a courageous lawman as they track down a stone-cold killer and his gang.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E4 Mason & Dixon: Trailblazing Surveyors English astronomers Charles Mason and Jeremiah Dixon brave deadly terrain and hostile Native Americans to resolve a border dispute in Colonial America. With science and courage, they survey their famous Mason-Dixon Line with pinpoint accuracy.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E8 Robert Rogers: Frontier Soldier Robert Rogers leads an elite fighting force of fearless rangers behind enemy lines to fight French forces in Colonial America, but one mission tests his men as never before when they must trek 200 miles through the wilderness without food.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E12 The Keepsake A young woman named Amanda comes to Sweetwater, claiming to be Teaspoon's daughter. But she and her companion's true intentions are to steal a keepsake worth a small fortune that once belonged to Teaspoon's dead daughter.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Schoolmaster Mr. Griswald is the new North Fork schoolmaster. As a harsh disciplinarian, he quickly clashes with Mark and his friend one too many times. When the boys decide to play hooky from school, they find big trouble when they get trapped in an old mine.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E11 The Promoter Con man Jack Scully comes to North Fork with his friend, Reuben Miles, a simple-minded young man who is fast with a gun. Scully uses the young gun to win money by coaxing people into gunfights. Lucas becomes the next target.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E12 The Battle of Stone Corral When bandits rob a train and gun down a pursuing marshal, they spark one of the largest manhunts in California history. After taking shelter behind the crumbling walls of Stone Corral, they make their final stand against a hail of gunfire.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E12 The Illustrator Hannah Shaw waits excitedly for New York artist Jeremiah Crowley to come to North Fork to paint her portrait. When he finally arrives, Hannah discovers he is a drunkard and is in trouble with the law. Lucas, as acting marshal, tries to help him out.

programme.title: Heritage Falls
programme.desc: Basketball coach Charlie Fitzpatrick has had a rocky relationship with his son, Evan, but now he has a great idea on how to heal the past. He takes his son, and grandson, Markie, to a rustic cabin where he hopes they will all bond by hiking and running an obstacle course. It's Evan's worst nightmare. Over three hilarious, adventurous, soul-searching days the men discover what it means to be a father, a son, a grandfather.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran battles prejudice and greed as he helps a woman save her ranch from a land grab, while searching for a cure for his mute son.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E15 A Case of Identity Aaron Wingate lost his wife and son in a river boat fire years ago. The boy was never found. Wingate hires two private detectives who come to North Fork and decide that Mark will fit the bill. Lucas must fight for custody.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E16 The Visitor A pretty young widow named Ann Dodd passes through North Fork on her way to claim her inheritance. She and Lucas are immediately attracted to each other, but danger awaits as other heirs try to take Ann's life to get the inheritance for themselves.

programme.title: The Old West Trading Post
programme.desc: S1 E1 Strong Box, Winchester, Spurs, Gloves, and Colt In rugged Whitefish, Montana, the Old West is alive and kicking at Cowboy Ron's remarkable store. Along with his wife, Eila, he buys, sells, and trades authentic Western memorabilia and honors the rugged individuals who tamed America's wild frontier.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E2 Home Ranch After Lucas buys his ranch, hired hands of a wealthy cattleman demand he leave. When Lucas refuses, the men beat him, drag him, and then they burn his ranch house to the ground. Lucas tracks these men down and confronts their boss, Oat Jackford.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E9 Last Shot at the OK Corral In an odd twist of fate, photographers C.S. and Mollie Fly decide to open a studio next to a dusty corral in Tombstone, Arizona, and they end up taking the last shot of the Old West's most infamous gunbattle, the Shootout at the O.K. Corral.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E1 The Bone War It's not gold that inspires a rush of treasure hunters to flood the windblown bluffs of Wyoming: it's bones. After stumbling upon a strange fossil, a man is caught in the crossfire of rival paleontologists warring over a trove of dinosaur bones.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E2 William Bartram: America's First Great Naturalist Naturalist William Bartram explores the unmapped regions of the South to document the native fauna and flora. After surviving many encounters with Native Americans and wildlife, it's an invisible virus that may finally end the journey and his life.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E3 Daniel Boone: Cunning Woodsman Legendary frontiersman Daniel Boone faces the biggest challenge of his life when the Shawnee take him prisoner. He must find a way to escape and travel 160 miles through hostile territory to warn Boonesborough, and his family, of a looming attack.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E13 Fall from Grace After Jimmy has an argument with Teaspoon, he quits the Pony Express and begins working for hired gunmen led by Grace, the owner of the local saloon. However, he learns that the outlaws are planning to rob the Army of guns and ammunition.

programme.title: The Last Days of Frank and Jesse James
programme.desc: When the famous James brothers give up robbing banks and attempt to live as reputable gentleman farmers, they are soon forced to seek revenge on the men who bomb their mother's house, crippling her, and killing their stepbrother.

programme.title: Cavalry Charge
programme.desc: When two brothers each decide to fight on opposite sides in the Civil War, they never dreamed they would need to reunite and fight together. It is the only chance they have, if they hope to survive a brutal Indian attack.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E31 The Angry Man A neighboring rancher's son is seriously injured in an accident. With the young man's condition getting worse, Lucas learns the rancher won't take his son to the doctor since he feels his wife died from poor treatment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E32 The Woman The residents force Miss Adams, the North Fork schoolteacher, to leave her job because they feel she is too progressive for supporting women's right to vote. Lucas gets involved and he learns that lies have been circulated by a past student.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E33 The Money Gun Lucas has a disdain for Oat Jackford since years ago he burned down his ranch to get him off property he wanted. When hired killer Tom King arrives in North Fork and is on Oat's trail, Lucas decides to side with and help the man he once hated.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E34 A Matter of Faith A trail bum rides into North Fork during one of the worst droughts in years. He claims that he can bring rain to their town. Many believe that he's a water witcher, but a railroad boss resents his intrusion and wants him gone.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E3 Jim Baker: A Born Leader Heading west as a young adventurer, greenhorn Jim Baker quickly develops a reputation as a skilled marksman and mountain man. When a party of trappers is surrounded and attacked by Cheyenne and Arapaho warriors, Baker proves that he is also a leader.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E2 Billy the Kid: Birth of an Outlaw Teenaged fugitive William Bonney is given a second chance when a kindhearted ranch owner offers him a job. But when his new employer is killed in cold blood, Bonney reverts to his criminal ways, seeking vengeance and transforming into Billy the Kid.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E10 The Discoveries of George McJunkin After a devastating storm, ranch foreman George McJunkin finds ancient bison fossils and flint points unearthed in a riverbank, and he sets out to find someone in the scientific community who will acknowledge the importance of his discovery.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E3 Home of the Brave After an Indian attack on settlers, Buck finds himself in the middle, torn between his loyalty to his Kiowa brother and his bond with Pony Express members. After the tribe captures Ike, Buck must prove that he is a real Indian at heart.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E5 The Brother-In-Law Mark's uncle, Johnny Gibb, a famous rodeo rider, comes to visit. Mark idolizes his uncle, but Lucas soon discovers that Johnny is on the run from the law after robbing an express office, and is afraid that Johnny is a bad influence on young Mark.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E6 Eight Hours to Die Corrupt Judge Burton seeks justice against those who are responsible for the hanging of his son, including Lucas McCain, who caught him. When Burton discovers that Lucas has a son, he captures Lucas to make him watch Mark suffer the same punishment.

programme.title: Christmas in the Pines
programme.desc: Ariel thought she bought the perfect cottage for Christmas, but, through a mix-up, two offers were accepted on the house. As she battles Mark, the other buyer, Ariel realizes she may not only have found the perfect house, but also the perfect love.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: Christmas in Wolf Creek
programme.desc: It's Samantha and Austin to the rescue as they track a wayward reindeer in time to save the town's Christmas Eve play, but will this adventure bring them closer together, or create more tension than their new relationship can weather?

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E31 The Angry Man A neighboring rancher's son is seriously injured in an accident. With the young man's condition getting worse, Lucas learns the rancher won't take his son to the doctor since he feels his wife died from poor treatment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E32 The Woman The residents force Miss Adams, the North Fork schoolteacher, to leave her job because they feel she is too progressive for supporting women's right to vote. Lucas gets involved and he learns that lies have been circulated by a past student.

programme.desc: S1 E6 Eight Hours to Die Corrupt Judge Burton seeks justice against those who are responsible for the hanging of his son, including Lucas McCain, who caught him. When Burton discovers that Lucas has a son, he captures Lucas to make him watch Mark suffer the same punishment.

programme.title: Christmas in the Pines
programme.desc: Ariel thought she bought the perfect cottage for Christmas, but, through a mix-up, two offers were accepted on the house. As she battles Mark, the other buyer, Ariel realizes she may not only have found the perfect house, but also the perfect love.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: The Warrant: Breaker's Law
programme.desc: U.S. Marshal John Breaker and his deputy ride to a town held hostage by a ruthless gang as they transport a prisoner through the West. With the fate of a community at stake, they must decide if they will abandon the town or make a stand for justice.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E14 Hard Time The Kid tries to help a woman in the corrupt small town of Prosperity but, while there, he finds himself in trouble with the law. When the sheriff sentences The Kid to hard labor, the riders suspect something is not quite right, and come to his aid.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E6 Fool's Gold After discovering a river filled with gold, Jim Bridger and his fellow trappers believe they are near El Dorado, the mythical Spanish city of gold. But their insatiable greed turns friends into enemies and puts Bridger at risk of a gruesome fate.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E5 A Prince on the Prairie While guiding a hunting expedition, Jim Bridger must deal with an arrogant foreign prince who is abusing his servant boy. But the tables soon turn, when it's the prince who needs rescuing, and his only hope is the long-suffering servant boy.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S1 E15 Charles M. Russell: The Cowboy Artist Charlie Russell is an aimless cowhand who loves the freedom of the cowboy way of life, and he is a self-taught artist who enjoys capturing the scenes of his rugged work on the range. Too embarrassed to ask people to pay for his paintings, he gives most of them away to friends or trades them for drinks at the saloon. But that changes quickly after he falls in love. Charlie’s new bride Nancy gives him the encouragement he needs to stop cowboying in order to focus on his artwork. Under her watchful eye, he sobers up, stops cowboying, and improves his mastery of painting. Nancy is so proud of Charlie’s talent that she doesn’t hesitate to ask top dollar for his paintings. Years later, when legendary gunfighter-turned-newspaperman Bat Masterson tries to do a piece on Charlie, he quickly realizes that he must first deal with the woman behind the famous cowboy artist Charles M. Russell.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E4 The Legend of Nat Love When Black cowboy Nat Love overnights in Deadwood during a cattle drive, he decides to enter a Fourth of July cowboy competition. Confident in his roping, riding, and shooting skills, he is eager to test his mettle against the best cowboys around.

programme.title: Cowboss Oklahoma
programme.desc: S1 E1 Risky Business With the help of his mother and trusted ranch hands, Cowboss Ethan Treadwell oversees his family's 60,000-acre cattle operation on the plains of Oklahoma. It's not an easy way to earn a living, but, for Ethan, it's a labor of love.

programme.title: Christmas on the Range
programme.desc: Despite constant threats from her ambitious neighbor, Kendall Riley fights heroically to save the family ranch. In a surprising turn of events, Clint McCree, a veterinarian and her neighbor's son, arrives on the scene to deliver a calf from a cow having trouble giving birth. Gradually, a romance blossoms, until her neighbor's henchmen scatter Kendall's herd and she wonders if Clint's concern is genuine or if he is part of his family's effort to sabotage her land. Filled with action, adventure, and emotion, this modern-day Western provides an engaging tribute to small towns, big dreams and the power of love. Stars Erin Cahill (Saving Grace, Red Widow, Sleepy Hollow), Nicholas Gonzalez (The Good Doctor, Walker Texas Ranger), A Martinez (Longmire, The Cowboys, Days of our Lives), and Lindsay Wagner (The Bionic Woman, Grey's Anatomy).

programme.title: Once Upon a Texas Train
programme.desc: An outlaw and a Texas Ranger have a life-long personal feud, but now, as grumpy older men, they must put their differences aside and face a common problem - a young gang of outlaws ravaging Texas.

programme.title: Christmas in Wolf Creek
programme.desc: It's Samantha and Austin to the rescue as they track a wayward reindeer in time to save the town's Christmas Eve play, but will this adventure bring them closer together, or create more tension than their new relationship can weather?

programme.title: Christmas in Wolf Creek
programme.desc: It's Samantha and Austin to the rescue as they track a wayward reindeer in time to save the town's Christmas Eve play, but will this adventure bring them closer together, or create more tension than their new relationship can weather?

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E10 Generations to Come Booger and Bubba struggle to keep up with ranch work while Cody is busy with his specialty cattle sale. Much to Bubba’s chagrin, Booger hires their ornery old hand Billy to pick up the slack. Cody manages to pack the sale barn with potential buyers, but will they open their wallets for the high-end cattle? Bubba and Kaley turn their dining room into a playroom for their expanding family. Booger begins collecting old stories and memories from Grandma to accompany the recipes in her cowboy cookbook.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E11 Let It Ripp The cowboys are busy processing cattle and preparing for an important shipment when a chute gets stuck, bringing work to a halt and risking time and money they can’t afford to lose. Booger trains a cutting horse and enters it into its first competition. Cody organizes a campout for the youth at the Alabama Sheriff’s Boys Ranch, and the guys share some of their cowboy wisdom with the hope of inspiring another generation to follow the cowboy way. Friends and family gather for a baby shower, where Bubba and Kaley reveal the name they’ve chosen for their new addition.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E17 Hero While hunting, Colly Vane encounters a dangerous outlaw, The Domino Kid, who forces Vane to shoot him. When he brings the body back to town, it's discovered he was shot in the back. Instead of being a hero, Vane faces danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E18 The Horse Traders Kansas Sawyer is Lucas' friend who was cheated in a horse-trading deal. Lucas investigates Colonel Bourbon's operation and discovers his illegal process. He also learns that the horse Sawyer bought was stolen and is being sought after by outlaws.

programme.title: Christmas in the Rockies
programme.desc: After her father is hurt in a timber accident, Katie Jolly must enter a lumberjack competition to save her family's business. But when the paramedic who saved her dad's life also joins the contest, a romance sparks just in time for Christmas.

programme.title: Freedom on the Range
programme.desc: S1 E1 From brave lawmen to rugged cowboys, discover the untold stories of African Americans' cultural significance in the Old West.

programme.title: Christmas in the Pines
programme.desc: Ariel thought she bought the perfect cottage for Christmas, but, through a mix-up, two offers were accepted on the house. As she battles Mark, the other buyer, Ariel realizes she may not only have found the perfect house, but also the perfect love.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E13 The Silent Knife Mark, a young mute boy, arrives in North Fork. When townspeople treat Mark badly because he cannot speak, Lucas and his son, Mark, befriend him. Desperate for cash, the boy steals $500 from a stagecoach line. Lucas convinces him to return the money.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E14 Miss Bertie Bertie Hoakam, a lively little old lady, comes to North Fork. She tells Lucas and Micah of her plan to capture a ruthless bandit for the reward money to support herself. To everyone's surprise, she succeeds with her plan.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E15 Six Years and a Day Mrs. Marston is in dire need of a doctor after problems arise as she is giving birth. Mark and Lucas try to help but they need Doc Burrage, who is out of town. More problems come when two men arrive at the McCain Ranch intent on killing the doctor.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E16 Flowers by the Door Lucas is helping Cora Seevers mend a broken fence when Micah rides up to tell them about a murder nearby. The only clue at the scene is a pack of flower seeds. Lucas discovers that a sly book salesman offering free seeds to his victims is to blame.

programme.title: County Line: All In
programme.desc: The murder of a crooked lawyer on the county line forces two neighboring sheriffs to put aside their differences to take down the killer.

programme.title: County Line: All In
programme.desc: The murder of a crooked lawyer on the county line forces two neighboring sheriffs to put aside their differences to take down the killer.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S7 E12 Final Cow Down, The During a long drought in lower Alabama, the cowboys have been chasing green grass throughout the surrounding area. Through new partnerships with other ranchers, they’ve finally ended up with a bumper crop of calves in north Alabama and a healthy herd in south Florida. Cody and Misty seek out the perfect high-value bull to build their growing cattle business, and they watch as their dream home finally takes shape. Bubba and Kaley welcome baby Ripp Walker Thompson into the world. Booger and Jaclyn surprise Grandma with a cowboy cookbook filled with her recipes and stories from life on the range.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E19 The Spoiler An elderly couple move to North Fork and settle down under a false name to keep the town from knowing they are parents of a vicious killer on the loose. However, their plan fails when their son shows up and causes chaos.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E20 Heller A teenage girl named Heller and her brother are abused by her drunken stepfather. The town becomes aware after Heller is caught stealing from the general store. The children plan the drunk's demise as the cruelty continues. Lucas steps in to help.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S3 E9 Heart of a Champion In a horsemanship test, the cowboys show off their four-legged partners’ best moves, then work cows on wild horses—if they can catch them!

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E8 The Gold Rush Lawman When failed prospector John Hicks Adams is elected sheriff of Santa Clara County, he must prove that he won't be a bust as a lawman too. Just weeks into the job, his courage is tested when a band of stagecoach robbers begins terrorizing the area.
